sentences.sContent: The bus took a very long and roundabout route .
sentences.sCn: 公共汽车路线很长，绕着圈子走。

synos.tran: 迂回的，绕道的；圆滚滚的

phrases.pCn: 以一种转弯抹角的方式

trans.tranCn: 迂回的，绕道的；圆滚滚的
trans.tranOther: a roundabout way of getting somewhere is longer and more complicated than necessary

trans.tranCn: 迂回路线；环状交叉路口
trans.tranOther: a raised circular area where three or more roads join together and which cars must drive around
